NLQ: What was the production of oil in the state of Rio de Janeiro?
NLQ preproccessed by GLAMORISE: What was the production of oil in the state of Rio de Janeiro?
NLIDB SQL: SELECT oil_production FROM ANP WHERE lower(state) = "rio de janeiro"
GLAMORISE SQL: SELECT * FROM NLIDB_RESULT_SET
insert: INSERT INTO NLIDB_SQL_FROM_NLQ  VALUES('What was the production of oil in the state of Rio de Janeiro?', 'SELECT oil_production FROM ANP WHERE lower(state) = "rio de janeiro"');

NLQ: What was the average monthly production of oil in the state of Rio de Janeiro?
NLQ preproccessed by GLAMORISE: What was the month production of oil in the state of Rio de Janeiro?
NLIDB SQL: SELECT year, month, oil_production FROM ANP WHERE lower(state) = "rio de janeiro"
GLAMORISE SQL: SELECT AVG(oil_production) as avg_oil_production FROM (SELECT SUM(oil_production) as oil_production FROM NLIDB_RESULT_SET GROUP BY year, month)
insert: INSERT INTO NLIDB_SQL_FROM_NLQ  VALUES('What was the month production of oil in the state of Rio de Janeiro?', 'SELECT year, month, oil_production FROM ANP WHERE lower(state) = "rio de janeiro"');

NLQ: What was the average yearly production of oil in the state of Alagoas?
NLQ preproccessed by GLAMORISE: What was the year production of oil in the state of Alagoas?
NLIDB SQL: SELECT year, oil_production FROM ANP WHERE lower(state) = "alagoas"
GLAMORISE SQL: SELECT AVG(oil_production) as avg_oil_production FROM (SELECT SUM(oil_production) as oil_production FROM NLIDB_RESULT_SET GROUP BY year)
insert: INSERT INTO NLIDB_SQL_FROM_NLQ  VALUES('What was the year production of oil in the state of Alagoas?', 'SELECT year, oil_production FROM ANP WHERE lower(state) = "alagoas"');

NLQ: How many fields are there in Paraná?
NLQ preproccessed by GLAMORISE: fields are there in Paraná?
NLIDB SQL: SELECT DISTINCT field FROM ANP WHERE lower(state) = "paraná"
GLAMORISE SQL: SELECT count(DISTINCT field) as count_field FROM NLIDB_RESULT_SET
insert: INSERT INTO NLIDB_SQL_FROM_NLQ  VALUES('fields are there in Paraná?', 'SELECT DISTINCT field FROM ANP WHERE lower(state) = "paraná"');

NLQ: What was the maximum production of oil in the state of Ceará per field?
NLQ preproccessed by GLAMORISE: What was the production of oil in the state of Ceará field?
NLIDB SQL: SELECT oil_production, field FROM ANP WHERE lower(state) = "ceará"
GLAMORISE SQL: SELECT field, max(oil_production) as max_oil_production FROM NLIDB_RESULT_SET GROUP BY field ORDER BY field
insert: INSERT INTO NLIDB_SQL_FROM_NLQ  VALUES('What was the production of oil in the state of Ceará field?', 'SELECT oil_production, field FROM ANP WHERE lower(state) = "ceará"');

NLQ: What was the minimum gas production in the state of São Paulo per basin?
NLQ preproccessed by GLAMORISE: What was the gas production in the state of São Paulo basin?
NLIDB SQL: SELECT gas_production, basin FROM ANP WHERE lower(state) = "são paulo"
GLAMORISE SQL: SELECT basin, min(gas_production) as min_gas_production FROM NLIDB_RESULT_SET GROUP BY basin ORDER BY basin
insert: INSERT INTO NLIDB_SQL_FROM_NLQ  VALUES('What was the gas production in the state of São Paulo basin?', 'SELECT gas_production, basin FROM ANP WHERE lower(state) = "são paulo"');

NLQ: What was the average monthly oil production by the operator Petrobrás?
NLQ preproccessed by GLAMORISE: What was the month oil production by the operator Petrobrás?
NLIDB SQL: SELECT year, month, oil_production, operator FROM ANP WHERE lower(operator) = "petrobras"
GLAMORISE SQL: SELECT operator, AVG(oil_production) AS avg_oil_production FROM (SELECT operator, SUM(oil_production) AS oil_production FROM nlidb_result_set GROUP BY operator, year, month) group by operator order by operator
insert: INSERT INTO NLIDB_SQL_FROM_NLQ  VALUES('What was the month oil production by the operator Petrobrás?', 'SELECT year, month, oil_production, operator FROM ANP WHERE lower(operator) = "petrobras"');

GLAMORISE SQL: SELECT field, AVG(gas_production) as avg_gas_production FROM (SELECT field, SUM(gas_production) as gas_production FROM NLIDB_RESULT_SET GROUP BY field, year) GROUP BY field ORDER BY field
insert: INSERT INTO NLIDB_SQL_FROM_NLQ  VALUES('What was the year gas production field?', 'SELECT year, gas_production, field FROM ANP ');

NLQ: What was the mean gas production per field with production greater than 100 cubic meters?
NLQ preproccessed by GLAMORISE: What was the gas production field with production greater than 100 cubic meters?
NLIDB SQL: SELECT gas_production, field FROM ANP WHERE gas_production > 100
GLAMORISE SQL: SELECT field, avg(gas_production) as avg_gas_production FROM NLIDB_RESULT_SET GROUP BY field HAVING avg(gas_production) > 100 ORDER BY field
insert: INSERT INTO NLIDB_SQL_FROM_NLQ  VALUES('What was the gas production field with production greater than 100 cubic meters?', 'SELECT gas_production, field FROM ANP WHERE gas_production > 100');

NLQ: What was the average yearly production of oil per field and state in the year 2015?
NLQ preproccessed by GLAMORISE: What was the year production of oil field and state in the year 2015?
NLIDB SQL: SELECT year, oil_production, field, state FROM ANP WHERE year = 2015
GLAMORISE SQL: SELECT field, state, AVG(oil_production) as avg_oil_production FROM (SELECT field, state, SUM(oil_production) as oil_production FROM NLIDB_RESULT_SET GROUP BY field, state, year) GROUP BY field, state ORDER BY field, state
insert: INSERT INTO NLIDB_SQL_FROM_NLQ  VALUES('What was the year production of oil field and state in the year 2015?', 'SELECT year, oil_production, field, state FROM ANP WHERE year = 2015');

GLAMORISE SQL: select field, avg(oil_production) as avg_oil_production from (select field, sum(oil_production) as oil_production from nlidb_result_set group by field, year, month) group by field order by field
insert: INSERT INTO NLIDB_SQL_FROM_NLQ  VALUES('What was the month production of oil field in the state of Rio de Janeiro and year 2015?', 'SELECT year, month, field, oil_production FROM ANP WHERE lower(state) = "rio de janeiro" and year = 2015');

NLQ: Give me the operator with the highest number of fields
NLQ preproccessed by GLAMORISE: Give me the operator with the fields
NLIDB SQL: SELECT DISTINCT operator, field FROM ANP
GLAMORISE SQL: SELECT operator, max(field) as max_field FROM (SELECT operator, count(DISTINCT field) as field FROM NLIDB_RESULT_SET GROUP BY operator)  ORDER BY operator
insert: INSERT INTO NLIDB_SQL_FROM_NLQ  VALUES('Give me the operator with the fields', 'SELECT DISTINCT operator, field FROM ANP');
